text: Motion

How about it?
Isn't this comedian amazing!?

Well,
even though it's a food review, it's so funny.

They're eating
what should be ordinary kinpira, right?
Right!

At first, I was just listening while doing something else,
but before I knew it, I was totally engrossed.
In the end, we ended up sitting right in front of the TV.
...Doing food reviews must be tough, huh?
That's for sure.
I don't think Mitsumine could eat naturally.

...?
What's up, Mamimin?

Ah...
I suddenly feel like eating kinpira.

...Well, it doesn't have to be kinpira.
I just want something sweet.
I know...!
But it seems like we're out of snacks...
Oh no...

Ugh... I missed lunch~!
I'm so hungry now~!
Motion
Motion

Ah...!
Mamimi, Yuika~!

I'm going to make pancakes now,
so if you want some, let me know!
Motion
I'm in!
